prompts: Create an ice-type Pokemon with a blue body and white accents that resembles a dinosaur.
Imagine a Pokemon that has a long neck, blue skin, and ice-like features, perfect for snowy terrains.
Design a cute Pokemon with a small stature and colorful ice elements that stand out in a winter landscape.
Show me a gentle creature that embodies the essence of winter with its icy blue color and soft features.
Generate a Pokemon that beams with icy elegance, featuring a sleek design and a friendly demeanor.
Make an adorable Pokemon that thrives in cold habitats, showcasing a unique blend of blue and white colors.
Give me a Pokemon that appears serene and icy, with features that highlight its aquatic origins.
